item.title: Lycée Fermat - Classes Préparatoires
item.description: Mathematics Algebra: Set Theory Algebraic Calculations and Trigonometry Complex Numbers Real Numbers and Numerical Sequences Arithmetic Usual Algebraic Structures Polynomials and Rational Fractions Vector Spaces and Linear Applications Endomorphisms Symmetric Group Calculus: Differential and Integral Calculus Functions of a Real Variable with Real or Complex Values Limits and Continuity Differentiability Convexity Asymptotic Analysis Integration Differential Calculus and Optimization Probability: Probabilities on a Finite Universe, Random Variables, and Laws Expectation and Variance Discrete Random Variables Analysis: Topology of Normed Vector Spaces Numeric and Vectorial Series Sequences and Series of Functions, Power Series Real Pre-Hilbert Spaces Discrete Summation Procedures Functions of Two Variables Integration over an Arbitrary Interval Ordinary Differential Equations Vector Functions Physics & Chemistry Waves and Signals Kirchhoff’s circuit laws Oscillators Linear Filtering Induction and Laplace Forces Periodic Signals Digital Electronics Kinetics and Mechanics Description and Parameterization of Point Motion Newton’s Laws Energetic Approach to Point Motion Angular Momentum Motion in a Conservative Central Force Field Motion of a Solid Non-inertial Reference Frame Laws of Solid Friction Optics Scalar Model of Light Waves Superposition of Light Waves Interferential Device using Wavefront Division: Young’s Double-Slit Experiment Interferential Device using Amplitude Division: Michelson Interferometer illuminated by a Spatially Extended Source Electromagnetism Motion of Charged Particles in Electric and Magnetostatic Fields Electrostatics Magnetostatics Maxwell’s Equations Electromagnetic Field Energy Propagation and Radiation Thermodynamics Principles of Thermodynamics Thermodynamic Machines Heat Transfers Quantum Physics Wave Function and Schrödinger Equation Stationary States of a Particle in Piecewise Constant Potentials Non-Stationary States of a Particle in an Infinite Potential Well Elements of Statistical Thermodynamics Boltzmann Factor System with Discrete Energy Spectra Classical Heat Capacities of Gases and Solids Chemistry Chemical Transformations in Aqueous Solution Relationships between the Structure of Chemical Entities and Macroscopic Physical Properties Structure and Physical Properties of Solids First Principle of Thermodynamics Applied to Physicochemical Transformations Second Principle of Thermodynamics Applied to Physicochemical Transformations Thermodynamic Study of Redox Reactions Kinetic Study of Redox Reactions: Current-Potential Curve Storage and Conversion of Chemical Energy in Electrochemical Devices Corrosion Computer science Computer science structures Number Representation Data Structures Immutable Recursive Types and Trees Applications of Trees Basics of Graphs and Shortest Paths Advanced Graphs Languages and Automata Paradigms Recursive Programming item.title: Mines de Saint-Etienne - Master of science (ICM Engineering degree)
Bayesian Deep Learning
item.description: In this 3 month research project, I wrote a bibliography and a report in the form of an article to summarize my findings about Bayesian Deep Learning. Report
